message: Morning comes without me getting much sleep.
I drag my weary body out of bed and leave the room.
When I sit down in the den and turn on the TV, they're playing the same event coverage as yesterday.
After the report on the parade, something new appears on the screen.
The image wakes me right up.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Home..."
The newscaster is cheerfully describing a sight even more bizarre than what I saw yesterday.
Everyone is smiling.
And it's not like they're enjoying themselves―at least, not that I can tell. These are eerie, mask-like smiles, plastered to their faces.
The eyes above them are vacant.
I can hear them cheering, while the reporter babbles about how even the Old Residential District is looking forward to the event.

name: 蒼葉
message: "You gotta be kidding me..."
They... They look just like all those people in front of the tower yesterday.
Did that music do this?
Is everyone okay?!
Without thinking, I open my Coil.
Unsurprisingly, no one has responded to my messages.
Still, I try calling them.
...No connection.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Shit..."
I don't know that anything's happened to them.
In fact, they're probably fine. If anyone can handle this, it's Granny.
Still...
Fear coils in my gut.
What if Granny and the others are affected...
Try as I might, I can't stop myself from imagining the worst.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ren, let's go."
I get up off the couch.

name: 蓮
message: "...Roger."
For a moment, Ren looks like he wants to say something, but then he jumps off the couch and follows me.
I get dressed, put Ren in my bag, and run out the door.
